description: Try our easy to follow Egg & Sprout Sandwich + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Egg & Sprout Sandwich + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 free range eggs, hard boiled, mashed
1 navel orange, peeled, cut into chunks
30g cheese block, cut into small stars

recipeInstructions.text: Combine eggs and 2 tbs yoghurt in a small bowl. Top 1 bread slice with egg and sprouts. Top with remaining bread slice.
Snack 1: Combine orange, passionfruit and remaining yoghurt in a bowl. Divide between 2 airtight containers, then sprinkle with kernels. Store leftover yoghurt pot in the fridge.
Snack 2: Pack crackers and cheese, separately, in airtight containers.
